Verses: 2 eppadiyenil, Manushargal Tharpiriyaraayum, Panappiriyaraayum, Veembukkaararaayum, Agandhaiyullavargalaayum, Dhooshikkiravargalaayum, Thaai Thagappanmaarukkuk Keezhppadiyaadhavargalaayum, Nandriyariyaadhavargalaayum, Parisuththamillaadhavargalaayum,
3 subaava Anbillaadhavargalaayum, Inangaadhavargalaayum, Avadhooru Seygiravargalaayum, Ichchaiyadakkamillaadhavargalaayum, Kodumaiyullavargalaayum, Nalloraip Pagaikkiravargalaayum,
5 dhevabakthiyin Veshaththaith Thariththu Adhin Belanai Marudhalikkiravargalaayum Iruppaargal; Ippadippattavargalai Nee Vittu Vilagu.
7 eppodhum Katraalum Orubodhum Saththiyaththai Arindhu Unaraadhavargalaayirukkira Penpillaigaludaiya Veedugalil Ippadippattavargal Nuzhaindhu, Avargalai Vasappaduththikkollugiraargal.

8 yanneyum Yambireyum Mosekku Edhirththu Nindradhupola Ivargalum Saththiyaththukku Edhirththu Nirkiraargal; Ivargal Dhurppuththiyulla Manushargal, Visuvaasavishayaththil Pareetchaikku Nillaadhavargal.
9 aanaalum, Ivargal Adhigamaaip Balappaduvadhillai; Avviruvarudaiya Madhikedu Ellaarukkum Velippattadhupola, Ivargaludaiya Madhikedum Velippadum.
10 neeyo En Podhagaththaiyum Nadakkaiyaiyum Nokkaththaiyum Visuvaasaththaiyum Neediya Saandhaththaiyum Anbaiyum Porumaiyaiyum,

11 andhiyogiyaa, Ikkoniyaa, Leesthiraa Ennum Pattanangalil Enakku Undaana Thunbangalaiyum Paadugalaiyum Nandraai Arindhirukkiraai; Evvalavo Thunbangalaich Sagiththen; Ivaiyellaavatrinindrum Karththar Ennai Neengalaakkivittaar.
12 andriyum Kiristhu Yesuvukkul Dhevabakthiyaai Nadakka Manadhaayirukkira Yaavarum Thunbappaduvaargal.
13 pollaadhavargalum Eththargalumaanavargal Mosampokkugiravargalaagavum, Mosampogiravargalaagavumirundhu Menmelum Kedullavargalaavaargal.
14 nee Katru Nichchayiththukkondavaigalil Nilaiththiru; Avaigalai Innaaridaththil Katraai Endru Nee Arindhirukkiradhumallaamal,
15 kiristhu Yesuvaippatrum Visuvaasaththinaale Unnai Ratchippukketra Gnaanamullavanaakkaththakka Parisuththa Vedha Ezhuththukkalai, Nee Siruvayadhumudhal Arindhavanendrum Unakkuth Theriyum.
16 vedhavaakkiyangalellaam Dhevaaaviyinaal Arulappattirukkiradhu; Dhevanudaiya Manushan Therinavanaagavum, Endha Narkiriyaiyunj Seyyath Thagudhiyullavanaagavum Irukkumbadi,
17 avaigal Ubadhesaththukkum, Kadindhukolludhalukkum Seerthiruththalukkum, Needhiyaip Padippikkudhalukkum Pirayojanamullavaigalaayirukkiradhu.
